compiler.installGuide.windows:
On Windows, we recommend installing MinGW-w64 via MSYS2. Follow these steps:
  1. Install MSYS2 from https://www.msys2.org/
  2. Open the MSYS2 terminal and run: {0}
  3. Add the compiler's bin directory to your system's PATH (e.g., C:\msys64\ucrt64\bin).
